title: SvelteKit 2.17.0: `data-sveltekit-preload-data=“tap”` no longer works
body:
### Describe the bug

In the example at the link below, the link data should be loaded on the `mousedown` event on the link. This worked in SvelteKit `2.16.1`, but broke in `2.17.0` / `2.17.1`.

[Documentation](https://svelte.dev/docs/kit/link-options#data-sveltekit-preload-data)

### Reproduction

[SvelteKit
